title: Imily Bela Womens Summer Dress Tie Strap Boho Floral Beach Dress Square Neck Ruffle Sun Dresses A Line Smocked Maxi Dress
description: LIGHT & BREATHABLE - The tie strap maxi dress for women is made of comfortable and breathable fabric to keep you cool in hot weather. This a line bohemian dress is soft and lightweight, and easy to put on and take off.

STYLISH & ELEGANT - Our boho dress features a vintage floral print, a straight neckline, a shirred and stretchy bodice, elastic waist, tie up shoulder strap, a flowy ruffle hem. This womens floral dress is definitely a summer wardrobe staple, show off your charming collarbone and accentuate your charm.

TREND COLLOCATION - Easily pair this sleeveless summer dress with your favorite heels or sandals, sunglasses, hats, necklace, clutches, leather jacket, and coat for a dainty and elegant look, enjoy your travel and colorful life.

SUITABLE OCCASIONS - Our casual beach dresses are suitable for cocktails, weddings, beaches, parties, clubs, shopping, dating, vacation, offices, or daily life. The smocked tiered dress is perfect for any occasion in late spring, summer, and early fall.

GARMENT CARE - Hand wash or machine wash your long summer sun dresses in a similar color at low temperature, do not bleach, and hang to dry. Note: Please follow our size chart to find a cute dress that suits you.
